song.title: Robot Anarchy
song.info:
Download link: https://files.scene.org/view/music/artists/rage/2007/robotmusic/rage-robot_03_anarchy.mp3
Lyrics: Right now - I'm just a lonely robot I don't want to follow orders I want to be an anarchist I wanna destroy - possibly Cause I wanna be anarchy - That's right - I like my robot music fantastic and hardcore slideshow selfdestruction is imminent I wanna destroy - possibly Cause I wanna be anarchy...
